item.title: CentOS 7配置samba
item.description: CentOS 7配置samba 安装 [root@jenkins_master opt]# yum install samba 配置服务 [root@jenkins_master opt]# vim /etc/samba/smb.conf [jenkins] comment = root directory path = /opt available = yes browseable = yes public = yes writable = yes guest ok = yes 启动
